name: SVG Converter
description:
Plugin for creating SVG code of the selected frame or image.

Instruction manual:

  1. Launch the plugin.
  2. Perform authorization or registration.
  3. Reload the plugin.
  4. Select the desired frame in the Figma layout.
  5. Click the button in the plugin (HTML, CSS, IMG) depending on the required code. Currently there is support for three SVG formats. 1.<svg>...</svg> 2.background-image: url(...) 3. <img src="...">. The selected frame will be translated into code and automatically copied to the clipboard.
  6. Paste the copied code into the code editor by pressing CTRL+V or by right-clicking in the code editor field.


For the convenience of work, the plugin can be minified. To do this, click on the "Mini version" button.
